Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Requires the state install alternative energy infrastructure on the roofs of all state facilities where practicable or on state owned property adjacent to building
Summary: Requires the state install alternative energy infrastructure on the roofs of all state facilities where practicable or on state owned property adjacent to building.
LawCode: Amd ยง83, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to requiring the state install alternative energy infrastructure on the roofs of all state facilities where practicable or on state owned property adjacent to building
